thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Georgina Kate
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Georgina Kate

author: Georgina Kate
title: Georgina Kate
text: Have thoroughly enjoyed the Intrepid trips we've been on. Amazing hosts/leaders, great itineraries - with a perfect balance of orgainised activities and down time to fill with your own adventures. A really terrific way to see somewhere without the hassle of organising it yourself.
